import React from 'react' import { NavLink, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from '../context/auth'; import toast from "react-hot-toast"; import useCategory from '../hooks/useCategory'; import SearchInput from "./SearchInput"; import { useCart } from "../context/Cart"; import { Badge } from "antd"; const Header = () => { const [auth, setAuth] = useAuth(); const [cart] = useCart(); const categories = useCategory(); const handleLogout = () => { setAuth({ ...auth, user: null, token: "", }); localStorage.removeItem("auth"); toast.success("Logout Successfully"); }; return ( <>
